questions.question: Share a memory of a holiday. Where was it, who went, what happened?

answers.answer: It was six days ago, Valentin's Day. I was with my fiance who invited me to the restaurant. I was so perfect !
Then, we went to the cinema. We shared a very good time. For one day, my fiance was so romantic or is it no usual.
Later, his father was going to drive us at home.
